title: Realme brings the affordable Realme Pad Mini & Buds Q2s to the Indian market
content:
Realme lifted the covers off its first 150W fast charging phone, the Realme GT Neo 3, in India today. Along with the affordable flagship, the company has also launched the Realme Pad Mini and the Realme Buds Q2s in the region. If you’re in the market for a budget-friendly tablet or TWS earbuds, here’s everything

The post Realme brings the affordable Realme Pad Mini & Buds Q2s to the Indian market appeared first on XDA.
description: Along with the Realme GT Neo 3, Realme has launched the affordable Realme Pad Mini & Buds Q2s in the Indian market. Read on to learn more.
